clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Investigated for use treatment in addictions and alcohol dependence

contraindications.pharmacodynamics: ALKS 29 is a combination of two agents with distinct pharmacologic properties designed to provide advantages over current oral medications for the treatment of alcohol dependence In the study ALKS 29 was generally well tolerated and led to both a statistically significant increase in the percent of days abstinent and a decrease in drinking compared to placebo when combined with psychosocial therapy
